text: The Gerald D. Coorts Memorial Arboretum is an arboretum located on the campus of Tennessee Technological University in Cookeville, Tennessee. The arboretum was dedicated in 1997 to honor Dr. Gerald Coorts, former dean of Tennessee Tech's College of Agriculture and Home Economics. It currently contains more than 150 trees, shrubs, and flowering plants, representing approximately 60 species. == See also == * List of botanical gardens in the United States == External links == * Gerald D. Coorts Memorial Arboretum Category:Arboreta in Tennessee Category:Botanical gardens in Tennessee Category:Protected areas of Putnam County, Tennessee
title: Gerald D. Coorts Memorial Arboretum
